title: [MoonSpinner's Glaesine Windows]
description: A broad skylight emits pale moonlight that hits the various window displays scattered through this room.  As the light refracts through each stained glaes panel, it sends a rainbow of color cascading towards the next.

A broad skylight emits pale golden light that hits the various window displays scattered through this room.  As the light refracts through each stained glaes panel, it sends a rainbow of color cascading towards the next.
